hey guys, I posted a <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/exploratory-research-project-workflow/53030/3|question in discourse >on the workflow, please comment.
I am pretty sure that is the right channel for people to share tips.

attachments.title: Exploratory research project workflow
attachments.text: Let’s narrow the scope. There are things that are a must: interactive environment with inline evaluation (VScode) version control. Git heavy data files stored separately a lot of plots

on the workflow, please comment.
I am pretty sure that is the right channel for people to share tips.

text: I don’t think <#C78UK7F1Q|physics> is the right channel for that?

elements.text: is the right channel for that?

text: Indeed, challenges in the ML workflow is actually the same as some physicists (e.g. me) have, and CS community is very advanced. I was very happy to learn about DVC, and CML. Trying it now
